Package Controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FriendsCallback
    this interface is used as an observer to notify whoever implements it about the changes that has happened on the friends list of a specific user
    MusicCallbacks
    this interface is used as an observer to notify whoever implements it about the changes that has happened on the currently playing song
    UserCallback
    this interface is used as an observer to notify whoever implements it about the changes that has happened on the currently logged in user
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChooseSongViewController
    this is the controller to the ChooseSongView, ChooseSongView , and UserSongView it implements an action listener to respond to all the button clicks on these views.
    FriendViewController
    this is the controller to the FriendView it implements an action listener to respond to all the button clicks on this views.
    KeyboardSettingsController
    The aim of this class is to perform the desired actions when the user pressed the Save or Back buttons.
    LogInUserController
    the controller for the LogInView that allows to perform two actions: go to the register view or login the user.
    MainController
    This class is in charge of handling the different views for the client side.
    ManageAccountController
    this is the controller to the ManageAccountView it implements an action listener to respond to all the button clicks on this views.
    MenuController
    this is the controller to the MenuView
    PianoKeysController
    this is the controller to the PianoKeys it implements an action listener to respond to all the button clicks on this views.
    RegisterUserController
    this is the controller to the RegisterUserView
    UserSongController
